shop.description: Id in  market/users, of the Shop that the post belongs to

negotiable.description: Wether the product's price is negotiable or not

last-touch: Just set it as the current timestamp

fr.description: Post's audio record as publisher on M+. Add field like this one for each language provided. When no language is defined, just create the 'fr' field

id.description: Audio file's id in the flystore/files table

key.description: Audio file's key in the flystore/files table

id.description: Image file's id in the flystore/files table

key.description: Images file's key in the flystore/files table

main-img.description: Main image's position in images list

likes.description: list of the current likes for this post

city.description: User's current city (id of the city)

state.description: User's current state (id of the state)

country.description: User's current country (id of the country)

person-of-contact.description: ID of the person to contact for this product

use-shop-voice-signature.description: whether to use the product's audio or not
